column146: The Financial Bid of E-Tender for Creation of 10 Ha Nursery Under SOPD-SFG was opened on 29th January 2024. Since all the bidders have quoted same amount and below the Estimated Amount, they have been admitted for Finanical Bid Evaluation.

column143: The bidder with the highest years of experience in Plantation i.e. Bhowmik Enterprise has been awarded the E-Tender.
